_sText:
Changes v4b2 
i upload it again it sayxs that i have upload 6 maps but shown are only 4 seems to be a bug??.

fixed bug at spawn positions
fixed bug on some minigames
fixed bug at warp room where ct not being able to enter some gates
fixed bug where chest fall through the ground
fixed bug that cause abnormal behavior on gem
fixed exploit that made it possible to hold weapon but gem respawns again
fixed some little other bugs
add text guide
add speed on t side
reworked one trap
reworked some minigames
reworked some textures
kosmetics addet



Changes: V4:

ANTIBHOP removed
Firegate removed ( Trap things still there but you can run trough and get no dmg)
Afk killer avtivation increased to 200
Diamond room: Dangerous Plates are visible now except 1 XD
Addet 3 secret Nades ( easy to find if you check everything)
Addet visual effect at Bridge that leads to that dark room
Lowered lava rising speed (you can sleep now)
Addet water places at t side to disable fall dmg
Replaced overstretched textures (still dont know why overstreched textures are bad)
Addet a 2. BGM music on left pyramid at beginning. Right pyramid has the old one now
Most fire deals no real dmg now (1-3% Dmg)
You can run through every fire now (At start and that fire gates)
Ct can use the fire to hide inside the fire

Changres: V3:
Lot of things changed and addet:

Traplist:

1. Firw gates (Not deadly anymore it heals you now)
2. Electro Crystal
3. Bloodbath
4. Fire Diamond
5. Lava Pillar
6. Go to hell
7. Elevator ( Dying possible)
8. Flame Pyramids
9. 2x Paths going down left and right
9.1 breaking diamonds (T can decide between left or right)
10. Trap if you dont care when you press 2 Switches
11. Rotating room
11.1 Energy vortex
11.2 T can throw nades do a place down
12. Lava rising
13. Flame Wave
14. Explosive Reaction if you throw the artefact against other Jewels
15. 2. Lava rising
16. Blood Ga√ü
17. Ground Fire

If you throw gem in the lava it will break and respawn at save locations
Throw artefact in the little hole where a light pillar comes out to activate
Teleport to minigames will be activadet
Ct get into a selection room where he can coice 1 of 8 different minigames
CT and T will automatically get to the Minigame Room

There are Pyramids that get Red then black and spark. During sparks jumping down pits is extreme deadly

This map is automatic fullbright due to bad behaviors in one of the minigames
Also mapsize in MB decreased

3T spawns
75 CTspawns aviable
